name: barhop
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to go to a series of bars and have drinks in each, for pleasure: Young people tend to barhop on a Saturday night before heading to a nightclub. She grew tired of her barhopping friends. He had been seen earlier that night bar-hopping with a group of friends.
More examplesFewer examplesWe barhopped around Palermo until 3am.With many cultural attractions, the city appeals to more than just a barhopping crowd.Young, barhopping revelers fill the street.As you know, when you're bar-hopping, the quality of the bathrooms can make a big difference to the experience!
